items.content_html: A lightweight and blazing-fast personal blog built with Hono, a minimalistic web framework. This project showcases a clean, modern design and efficient server-side rendering. Perfect for sharing thoughts, experiences, or technical content. Simple, fast, and easy to deploy!
items.title: konhito/Personal_blog_with_hono: A lightweight and blazing-fast personal blog built with Hono, a minimalistic web framework. This project showcases a clean, modern design and efficient server-side rendering. Perfect for sharing thoughts, experiences, or technical content. Simple, fast, and easy to deploy!

items.title: webbertakken/email-worker: Lightweight tool to process emails directly from Cloudflare

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript library that provides a set of commonly used React hooks to enhance your components with powerful functionality. Mainly created for my personal use.

items.content_html: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.

items.title: avoidwork/woodland: Lightweight HTTP framework with automatic headers

items.content_html: react-native-number-flow is a lightweight and high-performance React Native library for smooth, slot-machine-like numeric transitions, supporting decimals, prefixes/suffixes, and dynamic color changes.
items.title: ExodusMovement/react-native-number-flow: react-native-number-flow is a lightweight and high-performance React Native library for smooth, slot-machine-like numeric transitions, supporting decimals, prefixes/suffixes, and dynamic color changes.

items.content_html: 纯前端、浏览器可用、超轻量的基于对象存储的图床管理工具，支持腾讯云COS阿里云OSS七牛云Kodo等兼容亚马逊S3接口的各大平台。 | A pure front-end, browser-compatible, ultra-lightweight image hosting management tool based on object storage, supporting major platforms compatible with Amazon S3 interface such as Tencent Cloud COS, Alibaba Cloud OSS, and Qiniu Cloud Kodo.
items.title: 2061360308/S3-Image-Hosting: 纯前端、浏览器可用、超轻量的基于对象存储的图床管理工具，支持腾讯云COS阿里云OSS七牛云Kodo等兼容亚马逊S3接口的各大平台。 | A pure front-end, browser-compatible, ultra-lightweight image hosting management tool based on object storage, supporting major platforms compatible with Amazon S3 interface such as Tencent Cloud COS, Alibaba Cloud OSS, and Qiniu Cloud Kodo.

items.content_html: 七圣召唤 Lite，「原神」同人游戏。相比原版「七圣召唤」，具有轻量化、高自由度等特点。 ／ GITCG Lite is a "Genshin Impact" Doujin game. It is lightweight and highly customizable compared to the original game.
